name: PET Snake (C64)
description:
PET Snake 64 is a conversion of PET Snake which released in 2017 by Monument Microgames for the Commodore CBM/PET 40 columns machines. Both versions are developed by Donkeysoft UK (Shaun Bebbington)

PET Snake 64 is ready to install on TheC64 Mini, but will work on all Commodore 64 compatible computers and emulators.

Supports keyboard and joystick in this simple and fun 'gobble and grow' game. Each food pellet counts down from nine to zero, and your 'Snake' will grow the equivalent units and thus increase your score. The longer you grow, the harder the game.
